ost_step.3: However, Joseph lost two of his books so now he only retains 10944468 - 2 = 10944466 books.
ost_step.4: Thus, the current count for Joseph’s collection stands at 10944466 books.

subanswer.text: Inference alone cannot definitively determine if someone like Samantha falls into either category (friends or acquaintances) since these designations often rely heavily on mutual understanding and depth of interaction which can vary greatly individually across different contexts. Generally speaking though; people typically consider individuals their 'acquaintances' when interactions occur occasionally but lack substantial emotional intimacy or personal significance beyond routine exchanges – i.e., sharing occasional meals, borrowing items once in a while etc.; whereas we deem them our 'friends' when frequent engagement occurs over time fostering trust, companionship and shared experiences leading to deeper bonds formed through common interests/goals amongst others examples being regular catch up sessions via calls/texts apart from just physical meetings.
